tls:text.tls:line: In the first month of the spring

sense.def: first (month) of spring

tls:text.tls:line: the sun is in the constellation Encampment.

sense.def: sun

tls:text.tls:line: the sun is in the constellation Encampment.

sense.def: be in (a certain place)

tls:text.tls:line: the sun is in the constellation Encampment.

sense.def: constellation

tls:text.tls:line: the High Ancestor for this month is Tài Háo (i.e. Fú Xī),

sense.def: venerated ancestor, ancestor venerated and sacrificed to？？

tls:text.tls:line: the spirit for this month is Gōu Máng,

sense.def: supernatural spirits; supernatural entities; sometimes perhaps abstract: the supernatural

tls:text.tls:line: the animals for this month are the scaly ones,

sense.def: animals (general); the animal (of the season etc)

tls:text.tls:line: the animals for this month are the scaly ones,

sense.def: scaly creatures

tls:text.tls:line: the tone for this month is jué,

sense.def: tone 五音

tls:text.tls:line: the pitch of this month fits the Great Budding,

sense.def: pitch-pipe

tls:text.tls:line: the quantity of this month is eight,

sense.def: quantity; Anzahl; (magical) number e.g. 用六數 "uses the number six; use sextuplets of things".

tls:text.tls:line: the flavour of this month is the sour,

sense.def: taste, flavour

tls:text.tls:line: the flavour of this month is the sour,

sense.def: sourness

tls:text.tls:line: the smell of the month is that of rankness,

sense.def: odour

tls:text.tls:line: the smell of the month is that of rankness,

sense.def: ZZ: stench of goats; rankness

tls:text.tls:line: and when jì-sacrificing to Heaven during this month one gives priority to the spleen.

sense.def: read xiàn: give precedence to, give priority to; also in contexts which do not connote a positive attitude: take (and therefore:remove) first

tls:text.tls:line: and when jì-sacrificing to Heaven during this month one gives priority to the spleen.

sense.def: spleen; milt

tls:text.tls:line: the hibernating animals begin to move.

sense.def: hibernating

tls:text.tls:line: the hibernating animals begin to move.

sense.def: to begin to V; to be at the beginner's stage of V-ing

tls:text.tls:line: the hibernating animals begin to move.

sense.def: move

tls:text.tls:line: the otters sacrifice fish,

sense.def: otter

tls:text.tls:line: the otters sacrifice fish,

sense.def: sacrifice

tls:text.tls:line: migrating geese head north.

sense.def: migrating (geese)

tls:text.tls:line: migrating geese head north.

sense.def: wild goose

tls:text.tls:line: migrating geese head north.

sense.def: move northwards

tls:text.tls:line: (During this month) the Son of Heaven resides in the left appartment of the Green Yang Hall,

sense.def: an emperor; the emperor generally (with untensed predicate)

tls:text.tls:line: (During this month) the Son of Heaven resides in the left appartment of the Green Yang Hall,

sense.def: settle in, go to reside in, take up residence in

tls:text.tls:line: he rides a phenix bell chariot,

sense.def: furnished with a bell 鸞刀

tls:text.tls:line: he rides a phenix bell chariot,

sense.def: large chariot used by the emperor or very high officials, pulled by servants (the emperor's carriage being standardly called dà shèng 大乘)

tls:text.tls:line: he yokes "blue-dragons" (as horses) to his carriage,

sense.def: yoke

tls:text.tls:line: he yokes "blue-dragons" (as horses) to his carriage,

sense.def: azure blue (sky)

tls:text.tls:line: he yokes "blue-dragons" (as horses) to his carriage,

sense.def: dragon[BUDDH: in the Buddhist context dragons (SANSKRIT nāga) are regarded as one of the eight kind of beings who protect the Buddhist teachings]

tls:text.tls:line: he wears green clothes,

sense.def: (primarily visible, outer) clothes (worn on the upper part of the body)

tls:text.tls:line: he wears green jade,

sense.def: wear and make use of, dress up in; carry on one's side (a sword); wear on one's head (a hat); wear as embellishments of one's robe (jade)

tls:text.tls:line: he eats wheat and mutton,

sense.def: winter wheat; wheat; dry grain

tls:text.tls:line: he eats wheat and mutton,

sense.def: mutton

tls:text.tls:line: This month

sense.def: such a (month, i.e. a second month of a year)

tls:text.tls:line: Three days before the Opening up of Spring

sense.def: before N

tls:text.tls:line: the Grand Archivist announces this to the Son of Heaven, saying:

sense.def: great archivist

tls:text.tls:line: the Grand Archivist announces this to the Son of Heaven, saying:

sense.def: report (a fact N1) to (an audience N2) and V

tls:text.tls:line: and the predominant cosmic power is in Wood."

sense.def: abundant

tls:text.tls:line: and the predominant cosmic power is in Wood."

sense.def: the element of wood (one of the five elements)

tls:text.tls:line: The Son of Heaven then starts fasting.

sense.def: start fasting

tls:text.tls:srcline: 天子親率三公九卿諸侯大夫以迎春於東郊。
tls:text.tls:line: the Son of Heaven in person leads the Three Dukes, the Nine Ministers, the feudal lors, and the dignitaries in welcoming spring at the Eastern Suburb-altar.

sense.def: personally, in person

tls:text.tls:srcline: 天子親率三公九卿諸侯大夫以迎春於東郊。
tls:text.tls:line: the Son of Heaven in person leads the Three Dukes, the Nine Ministers, the feudal lors, and the dignitaries in welcoming spring at the Eastern Suburb-altar.

sense.def: go out to meet (in a hostile or friendly way); specifically: to welcome, come out to welcome (also seasons like spring)

tls:text.tls:line: Then he turns back,

sense.def: get back, return home

tls:text.tls:srcline: 乃賞公卿諸侯大夫於朝。
tls:text.tls:line: and he then offers ritual rewards for their attendance to the dukes, senior ministers, feudal lords, and dignitaries at the court.

sense.def: make a reward to (a person); award ritual presents to (someone) in compensation for his services

tls:text.tls:srcline: 乃賞公卿諸侯大夫於朝。
tls:text.tls:line: and he then offers ritual rewards for their attendance to the dukes, senior ministers, feudal lords, and dignitaries at the court.

sense.def: the royal court; the court

tls:text.tls:line: He gives out orders to his Prime Minister to spread his generosity and issue his orders,

sense.def: order formally (typically at a general or rather formal level) the N to V

tls:text.tls:line: He gives out orders to his Prime Minister to spread his generosity and issue his orders,

sense.def: prime minister (in any country, including Chǔ 楚)

tls:text.tls:line: to enact felicitations and to exercise generosity,

sense.def: enact; implement as an official; carry out as a morally responsible agent; put into practice, practise, carry out; operate according to; implement (a law) and apply it to

tls:text.tls:line: to enact felicitations and to exercise generosity,

sense.def: felicitations; making congratulatory presents

tls:text.tls:line: to enact felicitations and to exercise generosity,

sense.def: deploy generously; dispense generously to; show generosity to

tls:text.tls:line: to enact felicitations and to exercise generosity,

sense.def: act(s) of public generosity

tls:text.tls:line: to reach the people at large below.

sense.def: archaic, SHU/LIJI: the infinitely many people

tls:text.tls:line: The felicitations and the presents are then carried out,

sense.def: the giving of congratulatory gifts

tls:text.tls:line: The felicitations and the presents are then carried out,

sense.def: eventually; and so in the end, and in the event; and then, thereupon, subsequently; eventually, in the event

tls:text.tls:line: and there is nothing that is not adequate.

sense.def: nothing; what does not exist; no one

tls:text.tls:line: and there is nothing that is not adequate.

sense.def: be appropriate; be to the point; be the right thing in the right place

tls:text.tls:line: He then orders the Grand Archivist

sense.def: (THE SUBJECT N) then (will VERB)

tls:text.tls:line: He then orders the Grand Archivist

sense.def: order formally (typically at a general or rather formal level) the N to V

tls:text.tls:line: He then orders the Grand Archivist

sense.def: great archivist

tls:text.tls:line: to take care of the Statutes and to uphold the law,

sense.def: keep to and ensure that one does not lose; hold in reserve

tls:text.tls:line: to take care of the Statutes and to uphold the law,

sense.def: canonical model writings; traditional statutes; legal code, statute; rule

tls:text.tls:line: to take care of the Statutes and to uphold the law,

sense.def: uphold (the law)

tls:text.tls:line: to take administrative responsibility for the movements of the Heavens, of sun, moon stars and constellations,

sense.def: be empowered by higher authorities to be in charge of (e.g. the war horses)

tls:text.tls:line: to take administrative responsibility for the movements of the Heavens, of sun, moon stars and constellations,

sense.def: stars and constellations, heavenly bodies

tls:text.tls:line: that their positions and displacements are not in deviation from the rule,

sense.def: deviate from the rule or law

tls:text.tls:line: that they never come to deviate from the rules,

sense.def: get (something) wrong, be wrong about; make a mistake concerning; misapply (punishements etc); make a mistake of omission in relation to

tls:text.tls:line: that they never come to deviate from the rules,

sense.def: general guidelines

tls:text.tls:line: in order to make the beginning (of the year) standard.

sense.def: constant norm; highest norm; routine; constancy in attitude

tls:text.tls:line: As for this month

sense.def: such a (month, i.e. a second month of a year)

tls:text.tls:line: As for this month

sense.def: at the time N

tls:text.tls:srcline: 天子乃以元日祈穀于上帝。
tls:text.tls:line: the Son of Heaven prays for grain harvest to the Highest Sovereign on the first day.

sense.def: auspicious (day)

tls:text.tls:srcline: 天子乃以元日祈穀于上帝。
tls:text.tls:line: the Son of Heaven prays for grain harvest to the Highest Sovereign on the first day.

sense.def: pray for (something N1) to (something or someone N2) 祈穀於上帝

tls:text.tls:srcline: 天子乃以元日祈穀于上帝。
tls:text.tls:line: the Son of Heaven prays for grain harvest to the Highest Sovereign on the first day.

sense.def: good harvest of grain

tls:text.tls:srcline: 天子乃以元日祈穀于上帝。
tls:text.tls:line: the Son of Heaven prays for grain harvest to the Highest Sovereign on the first day.

sense.def: the highest god

tls:text.tls:line: Then one selects an appropriate day

sense.def: auspicious (day)

tls:text.tls:line: Then one selects an appropriate day

sense.def: day as defined as suitable by constellation of time

tls:text.tls:line: and the Son of Heaven in person takes along the ploughing tools

sense.def: personally, in person

tls:text.tls:line: and the Son of Heaven in person takes along the ploughing tools

sense.def: a plough

tls:text.tls:line: and he puts these between the armed guard and the driver.

sense.def: armed guard

tls:text.tls:srcline: 率三公九卿諸侯大夫躬耕帝籍田，
tls:text.tls:line: He then leads the Three Dukes, the Nine Senior Ministers, the feudal lords and the dignitaries along to personally till the field of the High Ancestor.

sense.def: lead; mobilize (somebody) (in order to do something)

tls:text.tls:srcline: 率三公九卿諸侯大夫躬耕帝籍田，
tls:text.tls:line: He then leads the Three Dukes, the Nine Senior Ministers, the feudal lords and the dignitaries along to personally till the field of the High Ancestor.

sense.def: personally; in person

tls:text.tls:srcline: 率三公九卿諸侯大夫躬耕帝籍田，
tls:text.tls:line: He then leads the Three Dukes, the Nine Senior Ministers, the feudal lords and the dignitaries along to personally till the field of the High Ancestor.

sense.def: plough, cultivate (fields etc)

tls:text.tls:line: The Son of Heaven will make three pushes,

sense.def: give a push 三推

tls:text.tls:line: and the Senior ministers, feudal lords and dignitaries will make nine pushes.

sense.def: give a push 三推

tls:text.tls:line: When he has got back,

sense.def: return, get back to where one came from; make one's return; flee back

tls:text.tls:line: he takes up a beaker (and makes a pledge) in the the Great Hall of Repose, the ancestral temple,

sense.def: hold and carry (any object) with one or with two hands; wield

tls:text.tls:line: he takes up a beaker (and makes a pledge) in the the Great Hall of Repose, the ancestral temple,

sense.def: three-footed bronze container with a broad long spout from which to drink wine on highly formal occasions, and the jué 爵 typically had room for one shēng 升 of wine; also used as a general word for a bronze wine cup of any kind

tls:text.tls:line: he takes up a beaker (and makes a pledge) in the the Great Hall of Repose, the ancestral temple,

sense.def: ancestral temple where all the ancestors find their repose, Great Hall of Repose for the Ancestors

tls:text.tls:srcline: 三公九卿諸侯大夫皆御，
tls:text.tls:line: and the Three Dukes, the Nine Senior Ministers, the feudal lords and the dignitaries are all in attendance,

sense.def: be in attendance, render service; manage to render service

tls:text.tls:line: and he declares this the Toast for Work Well Done.

sense.def: (declare the contextually determinate thing to be called) declare something (to be "X") 命曰：

tls:text.tls:line: and he declares this the Toast for Work Well Done.

sense.def: by way of a reward, being a reward for service rendered, serving as a reward

tls:text.tls:line: and he declares this the Toast for Work Well Done.

sense.def: the drinking of a toast, a toast; the consumption of wine; wine-drinking

tls:text.tls:line: During this month

sense.def: such a (month, i.e. a second month of a year)

tls:text.tls:line: During this month

sense.def: at the time N

tls:text.tls:line: vital energies of Heaven descend

sense.def: dynamic substrate of the universe

tls:text.tls:line: vital energies of Heaven descend

sense.def: descend (from Heaven)

tls:text.tls:line: vital energies of Heaven descend

sense.def: go down

sense.def: rise high, rise up

sense.def: rise up, fly up (of inanimate substances)

tls:text.tls:line: Heaven and Earth are in unison,

sense.def: be united, be in unison

tls:text.tls:line: the vegetation proliferates and sprouts.

sense.def: vegetation; plants and trees; plants (including, for example, flowers which are neither trees, shrubs or grasses)

tls:text.tls:line: the vegetation proliferates and sprouts.

sense.def: proliferate; archaic, poetic: be flourishing; become numerous, multiply

tls:text.tls:line: the vegetation proliferates and sprouts.

sense.def: sprout, grow

tls:text.tls:line: The king publicly announces the tasks of agriculture.

sense.def: announce generally to the officials; announce; make known, make public; comment on publicly

tls:text.tls:line: The king publicly announces the tasks of agriculture.

sense.def: agricultural, related to agriculture

tls:text.tls:line: The king publicly announces the tasks of agriculture.

sense.def: (especially official) matter, especially: public task, official business; public event; public project, (military) undertaking, task; one's professional concern 五事

tls:text.tls:line: He commands that the Field Inspectors take up temporary residence at the Eastern Suburb Altar

sense.def: order formally (typically at a general or rather formal level) the N to V

tls:text.tls:line: He commands that the Field Inspectors take up temporary residence at the Eastern Suburb Altar

sense.def: spend the night in (a place); take temporary lodging with or at

tls:text.tls:line: He commands that the Field Inspectors take up temporary residence at the Eastern Suburb Altar

sense.def: suburban altar

tls:text.tls:line: that they all renovate their boundary markings,

sense.def: boundaries (of a state, or between fields)

tls:text.tls:line: and that they take care with the straightness of paths and roads,

sense.def: take meticulous care in V-ing, V with critical attention

tls:text.tls:line: and that they take care with the straightness of paths and roads,

sense.def: cause to be properly straight

tls:text.tls:line: and that they take care with the straightness of paths and roads,

sense.def: roads and paths

tls:text.tls:line: and that they take care with the straightness of paths and roads,

sense.def: road

tls:text.tls:line: that they expertly assess mountains, slopes, impasses, plains and marshes,

tls:text.tls:line: that they expertly assess mountains, slopes, impasses, plains and marshes,

tls:text.tls:line: that they expertly assess mountains, slopes, impasses, plains and marshes,

sense.def: mounds, small hills; artificial mountains

tls:text.tls:line: that they expertly assess mountains, slopes, impasses, plains and marshes,

sense.def: inaccessible slopes

tls:text.tls:line: that they expertly assess mountains, slopes, impasses, plains and marshes,

tls:text.tls:line: that they expertly assess mountains, slopes, impasses, plains and marshes,

tls:text.tls:line: and to what the soils are appropriate for,

sense.def: land for agricultural cultivation; territory; territories, lands [maybe move to TERRITORY]

tls:text.tls:line: and where the five kinds of grain grow,

sense.def: cereal; salary in cereal 榖不可勝食

tls:text.tls:line: and where the five kinds of grain grow,

sense.def: flourish

tls:text.tls:line: so as to instruct and guide the people,

sense.def: instruct and guide> instruct properly

tls:text.tls:line: and that they must unfailingly participate in these activities in person.

sense.def: if

sense.def: guidelines

sense.def: peasant; agricultural worker, agriculturalist

tls:text.tls:line: then the peasants will not be confused.

sense.def: be misguided, deluded, confused

sense.def: such a (month, i.e. a second month of a year)

tls:text.tls:line: the king orders the Coordinator of Music to enter the school and to direct the dancing practice,

sense.def: a dance, dancing; dancing activities

tls:text.tls:line: whereupon he pays close attention to the statutes of sacrifice:

sense.def: cultivate (one's person, the ancients etc); apply oneself to; train and exercise (troops); occasionally also with negative objects: LH 2 修詐 "cultivate fraudulence"

tls:text.tls:line: whereupon he pays close attention to the statutes of sacrifice:

sense.def: sacrificial; sacred because connected with ritual performances

tls:text.tls:line: whereupon he pays close attention to the statutes of sacrifice:

tls:text.tls:line: he commands that in sacrificing to the mountains, forests, streams and marshes,

tls:text.tls:line: he commands that in sacrificing to the mountains, forests, streams and marshes,

sense.def: mountain forest; mountains and forests;

tls:text.tls:line: he commands that in sacrificing to the mountains, forests, streams and marshes,

tls:text.tls:line: no female animals be used.

sense.def: the female (horse; cow; victim, etc.)

tls:text.tls:line: he forbids the felling of trees, so that one does not overturn bird's nests,

tls:text.tls:line: and that one does not kill young animals, foetuses, new-born animals or birds,

tls:text.tls:line: that one does not hunt the new-born fawns and does not collect bird's eggs,

sense.def: bones with flesh on them

tls:text.tls:line: In this month

sense.def: such a (month, i.e. a second month of a year)

tls:text.tls:line: it is not acceptable that one should deploy military force,

sense.def: deploy, use (military force) 稱兵

tls:text.tls:line: and if one does use military force there is bound to be disaster from Heaven.

sense.def: Heaven-assigned; by the grace of Heaven; heavenly; divine

sense.def: major disaster; hardship; misfortune; calamity

tls:text.tls:line: it is not acceptable that such action should start from oneself.

sense.def: should

tls:text.tls:line: it is not acceptable that such action should start from oneself.

sense.def: from

tls:text.tls:line: it is not acceptable that such action should start from oneself.

sense.def: impersonal pronoun: one, oneself (as opposed to other things) 自我 (cf. 自我加冕 "be self-congratulatory)

tls:text.tls:line: One should not change the Way of Heaven,

sense.def: effect a change on something from a original state, typically, but not always, from a commendable, constant or ordinary state

sense.def: discontinue the use of what one has or what prevails

sense.def: summer-

tls:text.tls:line: plants will wither earlier than they should,

sense.def: prematurely, too early; so early

sense.def: prematurely, too early; so early

tls:text.tls:srcline: 能養天之所生而勿攖之謂天子。
tls:text.tls:line: One who can nurture what Heaven has brought to life and who will not interfere with it, is called a Son of Heaven.

sense.def: nurture, nourish, bring up, rear, take good care of, provide for; provide for the needs of; maintain, provide a maintenance allowance for, patronise; provide a mainenance allowance (of such-and-such an amount to non-children and children) (LY 2.7)

tls:text.tls:srcline: 能養天之所生而勿攖之謂天子。
tls:text.tls:line: One who can nurture what Heaven has brought to life and who will not interfere with it, is called a Son of Heaven.

sense.def: give birth to; cause to come into existence

tls:text.tls:srcline: 能養天之所生而勿攖之謂天子。
tls:text.tls:line: One who can nurture what Heaven has brought to life and who will not interfere with it, is called a Son of Heaven.

sense.def: interfere with

tls:text.tls:srcline: 能養天之所生而勿攖之謂天子。
tls:text.tls:line: One who can nurture what Heaven has brought to life and who will not interfere with it, is called a Son of Heaven.

sense.def: an emperor; the emperor generally (with untensed predicate)

tls:text.tls:line: When the Son of Heaven takes an initiative,

sense.def: decide to take an action, engage in action, become active; move to act

tls:text.tls:line: it is the sort of action which has as its motivating background the keeping unimpaired what is from Heaven.

sense.def: Nature; what is natural; natural endowment, natural features

tls:text.tls:line: It is from this motive that officials are established.

sense.def: official duties; bureau; 五官 "five bureaus"; office, official position NB: the distinction between the offices as such and their holders is blurred for very good reasons, since officials acted as representatives of their bureau.

tls:text.tls:line: It is from this motive that officials are established.

sense.def: OBI 5: from; starting out from a place; 自楚之滕 "went from Chu3 to Te2ng" also a time: 所自生 "that wherefrom something is born"

tls:text.tls:line: It is from this motive that officials are established.

sense.def: be brought into existence and solidly established

tls:text.tls:line: Establishing officials is for the keeping unimpaired what is alive.

sense.def: cause to exist, establish, bring into existence (e.g. laws etc); promote and establish; cause to be established as ruler

tls:text.tls:line: Establishing officials is for the keeping unimpaired what is alive.

sense.def: cause to be complete, cause to be intact and unimpaired; achieve a full measure of; achieve a full measure of success; extend as much as possible

tls:text.tls:line: Establishing officials is for the keeping unimpaired what is alive.

sense.def: the living, those who are alive; living creatures

tls:text.tls:line: The confused rulers of the present generation

sense.def: OBI: present, contemporary; in the present sequence of days/months

sense.def: generation 三世 "three generations"; one's own time; our own time; (e.g. the present) age, historical period; historical conditions; specifically: a period of thirty years.

sense.def: unclear; confused (and deluded)

tls:text.tls:line: The confused rulers of the present generation

sense.def: ruler; host; lord/ruler, owner (as being primarily in charge of territories and/or things)

tls:text.tls:line: when they have many officials, but on the contrary they harm living creatures through them,

sense.def: have much; have many; contain many 多金

sense.def: on the contrary; contrary to intentions; as opposed to what one would expect; on the other hand

sense.def: to damage, to inflict harm; impair (clear-sightedness) 甚害田

tls:text.tls:line: This is like training and building up armed forces:

sense.def: on the contrary; contrary to intentions; as opposed to what one would expect; on the other hand

tls:text.tls:line: Now it is the nature of water to be clear and pure,

tls:text.tls:line: Now it is the nature of water to be clear and pure,

sense.def: be translucent and physically pure, without admixtures

tls:text.tls:line: and therefore it does not get to be pure.

tls:text.tls:line: It is the nature of man to be long-lived,

sense.def: marker of topics to be discussed in general abstract terms: as for N as such (Note that the comment is never narrative: one might say that this topic marker, like 夫 has a modal function.)

tls:text.tls:srcline: 故使莊王功跡著乎竹帛，
tls:text.tls:line: Thus he caused all kinds of achievements of King Zhuāng to be written down on bamboo and silk

sense.def: achievements of all kinds

tls:text.tls:line: Thus he caused all kinds of achievements of King Zhuāng to be written down on bamboo and silk

tls:text.tls:line: and handed down to later generations.

sense.def: later (generations); succeeding, second (main wife)

tls:text.tls:line: and handed down to later generations.

sense.def: generation 三世 "three generations"; one's own time; our own time; (e.g. the present) age, historical period; historical conditions; specifically: a period of thirty years.

tls:text.tls:line: THE RIGHT KIND OF FORMATIVE INFLUENCE

sense.def: adequate, justified; positive

tls:text.tls:line: Mòzǐ saw someone dyeing plain silk,

sense.def: perceive visually; witness, come across; lay one's eyes on; focus and perceive properly; come across; notice; visualise intellectually; occasionally: imagine, have a vision of (ghosts)

tls:text.tls:line: Mòzǐ saw someone dyeing plain silk,

sense.def: dye

tls:text.tls:line: Mòzǐ saw someone dyeing plain silk,

sense.def: pure and unadulterated, unadorned; pristine and plain, uncorrupted; plain, unaffected; unpainted, unvarnished; unornamented

sense.def: silk cloth

tls:text.tls:line: "If one dyes it in blue, then it will become blue,

sense.def: turn azure blue

tls:text.tls:line: "If one dyes it in blue, then it will become blue,

sense.def: blue dye

tls:text.tls:line: if one dyes it in brown it will become brown.

sense.def: become yellow;turn yellow; turn brown

tls:text.tls:line: if one dyes it in brown it will become brown.

sense.def: yellow-brownish dye

tls:text.tls:line: When that by means of which one immerses it changes

sense.def: be changed from an original (typically but not always commendable) natural state; also: be changed into something different, be replaced with something else

tls:text.tls:line: the colour will also change.

sense.def: colour

tls:text.tls:line: the colour will also change.

sense.def: be changed from an original (typically but not always commendable) natural state; also: be changed into something different, be replaced with something else

tls:text.tls:line: If one immerses it five ways then in that way one will make five colours."

sense.def: colour

tls:text.tls:line: Therefore, when it comes to dyeing one must not fail to be careful.

sense.def: dyeing

tls:text.tls:line: Therefore, when it comes to dyeing one must not fail to be careful.

sense.def: may properly be VERBED, should in effect be VERBED

tls:text.tls:line: Therefore, when it comes to dyeing one must not fail to be careful.

sense.def: be carefully thought about

tls:text.tls:line: It is not only dyeing where things are like this,

sense.def: speak of; mention

tls:text.tls:line: It is not only dyeing where things are like this,

sense.def: silk cloth

sense.def: to be so, to be like this, to be such (stands for verbal predicate)

sense.def: "dyeing"

tls:text.tls:line: Shùn received formative influence from Xǔ Yóu and by Bó Yáng;

sense.def: get influenced, receive a formative influence from; be stained with relation to

tls:text.tls:line: Yǔ received formative influence from Gāo Yáo and Bó Yì,

sense.def: get influenced, receive a formative influence from; be stained with relation to

tls:text.tls:line: Tāng received formative influence from Yī Yǐn and Zhòng Huī,

sense.def: get influenced, receive a formative influence from; be stained with relation to

tls:text.tls:line: As for these four kings, what they were exposed to the right kind of influence.

sense.def: 斯三者 nominaliser after a number phrase or numbered phrase

tls:text.tls:line: As for these four kings, what they were exposed to the right kind of influence.

sense.def: be appropriate; be to the point; be the right thing in the right place

tls:text.tls:line: That is why they ruled over all under Heaven,

sense.def: gain royal supremacy, reign supreme; become a king, get to rule as king; become a proper king

tls:text.tls:line: were established as Sons of Heaven,

sense.def: be installed so as to become: be installed as; get oneself established as

tls:text.tls:srcline: 舉天下之仁義顯人必稱此四王者。
tls:text.tls:line: Whenever one brings up moral men in all under Heaven and holds up people as distinguished, one is bound to mention these four kings.

sense.def: bring up, mention

tls:text.tls:srcline: 舉天下之仁義顯人必稱此四王者。
tls:text.tls:line: Whenever one brings up moral men in all under Heaven and holds up people as distinguished, one is bound to mention these four kings.

sense.def: the kind-hearted and the righteous, those who have moral principles

tls:text.tls:srcline: 舉天下之仁義顯人必稱此四王者。
tls:text.tls:line: Whenever one brings up moral men in all under Heaven and holds up people as distinguished, one is bound to mention these four kings.

sense.def: illustrious, eminent; conspicuous

tls:text.tls:srcline: 舉天下之仁義顯人必稱此四王者。
tls:text.tls:line: Whenever one brings up moral men in all under Heaven and holds up people as distinguished, one is bound to mention these four kings.

sense.def: 斯三者 nominaliser after a number phrase or numbered phrase

tls:text.tls:line: Jiè of the Xià dynasty received formative influence from Gān Xīn and by Qí Zhǒng,

sense.def: get influenced, receive a formative influence from; be stained with relation to

tls:text.tls:line: Zhòu of the Yīn (i.e. Shāng) dynasty received formative influence from the Lord of Ch2ó3ng and by Èlái;

sense.def: get influenced, receive a formative influence from; be stained with relation to

tls:text.tls:srcline: 周厲王染於虢公長父、榮夷終，
tls:text.tls:line: King Lì of the Zhōu dynasty received formative influence from Duke Zhǎngfū of Guō and by Róng Yízhōng.

sense.def: get influenced, receive a formative influence from; be stained with relation to

tls:text.tls:srcline: 周厲王染於虢公長父、榮夷終，
tls:text.tls:line: King Lì of the Zhōu dynasty received formative influence from Duke Zhǎngfū of Guō and by Róng Yízhōng.

sense.def: 虢公鼓，祭公敦 Duke

tls:text.tls:line: These four kings came under what was not the right kind of influence

sense.def: 斯三者 nominaliser after a number phrase or numbered phrase

tls:text.tls:line: and as a result their state suffered serious damage and they died

sense.def: be destroyed

tls:text.tls:line: and they suffered shame in the eyes of all under Heaven.

sense.def: be humiliated; allow oneself to be humiliated

tls:text.tls:srcline: 舉天下之不義辱人必稱此四王者。
tls:text.tls:line: When one brings up examples of men devoid of rectitude in all under Heaven one is bound to mention these four kings.

sense.def: bring up, mention

tls:text.tls:srcline: 舉天下之不義辱人必稱此四王者。
tls:text.tls:line: When one brings up examples of men devoid of rectitude in all under Heaven one is bound to mention these four kings.

sense.def: the wicked

tls:text.tls:srcline: 舉天下之不義辱人必稱此四王者。
tls:text.tls:line: When one brings up examples of men devoid of rectitude in all under Heaven one is bound to mention these four kings.

sense.def: speak of; mention

tls:text.tls:srcline: 舉天下之不義辱人必稱此四王者。
tls:text.tls:line: When one brings up examples of men devoid of rectitude in all under Heaven one is bound to mention these four kings.

sense.def: 此二人者

tls:text.tls:line: Duke Huán of Q!í received formative influence from Guǎn Zhòng and Bào Shū,

sense.def: get influenced, receive a formative influence from; be stained with relation to

tls:text.tls:line: Duke Wén of Jìn received formative influence from Jiù Fàn and Xì Yǎn,

sense.def: get influenced, receive a formative influence from; be stained with relation to

tls:text.tls:srcline: 荊莊王染於孫叔敖、沈尹蒸，
tls:text.tls:line: King Zhuāng of Chǔ* received formative influence from Sūnshū Ào and Shěn Yǐnzhēng,

sense.def: get influenced, receive a formative influence from; be stained with relation to

tls:text.tls:srcline: 吳王闔廬染於伍員、文之儀，
tls:text.tls:line: King Hélyǔ of Wú received formative influence from Wǔ Yún and Wén Zhiyí,

sense.def: get influenced, receive a formative influence from; be stained with relation to

tls:text.tls:srcline: 越王句踐染於范蠡、大夫種，
tls:text.tls:line: King Gōu Jiàn received formative influence from Fàn Luó and Dignitary Zhǒng.

sense.def: get influenced, receive a formative influence from; be stained with relation to

sense.def: get to dominate as hegemon, gain the ascendancy over

tls:text.tls:line: and the fame of their achievements spread to later generations.

tls:text.tls:line: and the fame of their achievements spread to later generations.

sense.def: be passed down, be transmitted

sense.def: get influenced, receive a formative influence from; be stained with relation to

sense.def: get influenced, receive a formative influence from; be stained with relation to

sense.def: get influenced, receive a formative influence from; be stained with relation to

tls:text.tls:line: Earl Yáo of Zhì received formative influence from Zhì Guó and of Zhāng Wǔ,

sense.def: get influenced, receive a formative influence from; be stained with relation to

tls:text.tls:line: Zhōngshān Shàng received formative influence fromWèi Yì and of Yǎn Cháng,

sense.def: get influenced, receive a formative influence from; be stained with relation to

tls:text.tls:srcline: 宋康王染於唐鞅、田不禋。
tls:text.tls:line: King Sòng of Sòng received formative influence from Táng Yǎng and Tián Bùyīn.

sense.def: get influenced, receive a formative influence from; be stained with relation to

tls:text.tls:line: Those who these six rulers were exposed to formative influence of the right kind

sense.def: after number phrase 三家者， 之數物者

tls:text.tls:line: and as a result their state were all decimated or disappeared,

sense.def: be destroyed and disappear: be utterly destroyed, be completely destroyed

tls:text.tls:line: in their ancestral shrines one did not offer bloody food-sacrifices (to their ancestors),

sense.def: ancestral temples, temples for the ancestors (symbols of the nation, see this word under NATION)

sense.def: offspring, later generations

tls:text.tls:line: they had their line of later succession disruped,

sense.def: offspring 後類

tls:text.tls:line: as rulers and ministers they were dispersed,

sense.def: scatter in all directions

tls:text.tls:line: their population migrated and disappeared.

sense.def: population; the people in general

tls:text.tls:line: their population migrated and disappeared.

sense.def: migrate disappear

tls:text.tls:srcline: 舉天下之貪暴可羞人必稱此六君者。
tls:text.tls:line: When one brings up greedy and violent people whom one should be ashamed of, one is bound to mention these six rulers.

sense.def: bring up, mention

tls:text.tls:srcline: 舉天下之貪暴可羞人必稱此六君者。
tls:text.tls:line: When one brings up greedy and violent people whom one should be ashamed of, one is bound to mention these six rulers.

sense.def: greedy

tls:text.tls:srcline: 舉天下之貪暴可羞人必稱此六君者。
tls:text.tls:line: When one brings up greedy and violent people whom one should be ashamed of, one is bound to mention these six rulers.

sense.def: reckless, cruel and violent

tls:text.tls:srcline: 舉天下之貪暴可羞人必稱此六君者。
tls:text.tls:line: When one brings up greedy and violent people whom one should be ashamed of, one is bound to mention these six rulers.

sense.def: of the kind that one should be personally ashamed of; of the kind that should be ashamed of themselves

tls:text.tls:srcline: 舉天下之貪暴可羞人必稱此六君者。
tls:text.tls:line: When one brings up greedy and violent people whom one should be ashamed of, one is bound to mention these six rulers.

sense.def: be something to be personally ashamed of

tls:text.tls:srcline: 舉天下之貪暴可羞人必稱此六君者。
tls:text.tls:line: When one brings up greedy and violent people whom one should be ashamed of, one is bound to mention these six rulers.

sense.def: speak of; mention

tls:text.tls:srcline: 舉天下之貪暴可羞人必稱此六君者。
tls:text.tls:line: When one brings up greedy and violent people whom one should be ashamed of, one is bound to mention these six rulers.

sense.def: after number phrase 三家者， 之數物者

tls:text.tls:srcline: 凡為君非為君而因榮也，
tls:text.tls:line: In general those who are rulers will not enjoy a glorious reputation just because they are rulers,

sense.def: because of V2ing, the subject V1ed> therefore

tls:text.tls:srcline: 凡為君非為君而因榮也，
tls:text.tls:line: In general those who are rulers will not enjoy a glorious reputation just because they are rulers,

sense.def: enjoy a high reputation; enjoy glory and honour 莫榮於孝

tls:text.tls:line: and they will not enjoy peace just because they are rulers:

sense.def: because of V2ing, the subject V1ed> therefore

tls:text.tls:line: and they will not enjoy peace just because they are rulers:

sense.def: feel comfortable, feel well

tls:text.tls:line: it is because they make it their business to put into practice just principle.

sense.def: enact; implement as an official; carry out as a morally responsible agent; put into practice, practise, carry out; operate according to; implement (a law) and apply it to

tls:text.tls:line: Putting just principle into practice arises from an appropriate formative influence on one.

sense.def: arise from 生於

tls:text.tls:line: Putting just principle into practice arises from an appropriate formative influence on one.

sense.def: adequate, justified; positive

tls:text.tls:line: Putting just principle into practice arises from an appropriate formative influence on one.

sense.def: influence, formative influence

tls:text.tls:line: Thus those who in ancient times were good at being rulers

sense.def: excel at, be good at

tls:text.tls:line: Thus those who in ancient times were good at being rulers

sense.def: fulfill the function of (occasionally also: pretend to be), impersonate,

tls:text.tls:line: made every effort at judging people

sense.def: work hard at V-ing

tls:text.tls:line: made every effort at judging people

sense.def: assess professionally (somebody); adjudicate; classify

tls:text.tls:line: and they relaxed about taking care of concrete business:

sense.def: Take it easy with Nab-ing, spend no big effort on Nab-ing

tls:text.tls:line: and they relaxed about taking care of concrete business:

sense.def: official, belonging to the duties of officials

tls:text.tls:line: and they relaxed about taking care of concrete business:

sense.def: (especially official) matter, especially: public task, official business; public event; public project, (military) undertaking, task; one's professional concern 五事

tls:text.tls:line: they had got hold of the basic guideline.

sense.def: the right kind of, the appropriate, the relevant, the suitable 其人

tls:text.tls:line: they had got hold of the basic guideline.

sense.def: leading thread, warp; cardinal principle

tls:text.tls:line: Those who are unable to fulfill the function of a ruler

sense.def: fulfill the function of (occasionally also: pretend to be), impersonate,

tls:text.tls:line: injure their bodies, use up their spirits,

sense.def: inflict harm on (physical objects)

tls:text.tls:line: injure their bodies, use up their spirits,

sense.def: body; physical appearance (mostly n(post-N))

tls:text.tls:line: injure their bodies, use up their spirits,

sense.def: waste in one go, spend money suddenly and on a large scale

tls:text.tls:line: they sadden their minds and wear out ears and eyes,

sense.def: sadden, make depressed

tls:text.tls:line: they sadden their minds and wear out ears and eyes,

sense.def: wear out, tire out

tls:text.tls:line: but their state becomes more and more endangered

sense.def: ever more; SHI: increasingly; more and more; all the more, even more; ZZ: the more... the more

tls:text.tls:line: but their state becomes more and more endangered

sense.def: get into danger, become endagered

tls:text.tls:line: and their persons become more and more humiliated.

sense.def: ever more; SHI: increasingly; more and more; all the more, even more; ZZ: the more... the more

tls:text.tls:line: This is because they do not understand what is important.

sense.def: important, crucial; essential

tls:text.tls:line: This is because they do not understand what is important.

sense.def: precedent, antecedent; what is behind something, background, cause; reasons behind; basic features SHUOWEN: 使為之也。

tls:text.tls:line: When one does not understand the important point then one comes under inappropriate formative influence.

sense.def: important, crucial; essential

tls:text.tls:line: then wherefrom should the basic principle come.

sense.def: pattern of things, natural principle; Principle; reasonable principle, reason

tls:text.tls:line: then wherefrom should the basic principle come.

sense.def: what object?

tls:text.tls:line: then wherefrom should the basic principle come.

sense.def: occur, take place 大風至

tls:text.tls:line: The six rulers were definitely cases in point.

sense.def: after number phrase 三家者， 之數物者

tls:text.tls:line: did not consider their states as important or did not love their persons:

sense.def: consider as important; consider as a serious matter, take seriously, attach importance to; be chiefly concerned with; 最重

tls:text.tls:line: did not consider their states as important or did not love their persons:

sense.def: love and care for, take loving care of; generally: take proper care of (one's person/life)

tls:text.tls:line: The survival and ruin of these people were not only inherently cases in point,

sense.def: be such; be a paradigmatic example; be a typical case in point; be a relevant example; be a paradigm case

tls:text.tls:line: Sovereigns and kings are likewise cases in point.

sense.def: royal leaders; royal leader

tls:text.tls:line: And it is not only a state that is subject to formative influences.

sense.def: influence, formative influence

tls:text.tls:srcline: 孔子學於老聃、孟蘇夔、靖叔。
tls:text.tls:line: Confucius studied with Lǎo Dān, Mèng Sūkuí, and Jìng Shu.

sense.def: study with 學於孔子

tls:text.tls:srcline: 魯惠公使宰讓請郊廟之禮於天子，
tls:text.tls:line: Duke Huì of Lǔ sent Zǎi Ràng to ask the Son of Heaven about the rituals at the ancestral suburban shrine

sense.def: ask N2's advice about N1

tls:text.tls:line: King Píng (of Zhōu) sent Archivist Jué to go along (to Lǔ),

sense.def: cause (somebody) to stay where he is; not allow (somebody) to leave

tls:text.tls:line: Archivist Jué's descendents were in Lǔ,

sense.def: HF 14.6.28 sucessor

tls:text.tls:line: Archivist Jué's descendents were in Lǔ,

sense.def: dwell in

tls:text.tls:line: and Mòzǐ studied with (one of) them.

sense.def: study with 學於孔子

tls:text.tls:line: These two gentlemen

sense.def: 此二人者

tls:text.tls:line: These two gentlemen

sense.def: scholar, man of learning, man of letters

tls:text.tls:line: These two gentlemen

sense.def: after number phrase 三家者， 之數物者

tls:text.tls:line: had no ranks or positions to make people illustrious,

sense.def: rank and position; ranks or positions of any kind

tls:text.tls:line: had no ranks or positions to make people illustrious,

sense.def: cause to be illustrious; promote reputation of

tls:text.tls:line: they had no rewards or emoluments with which to benefit others,

sense.def: rewards or emoluments of any kind

tls:text.tls:line: they had no rewards or emoluments with which to benefit others,

sense.def: benefit; be profitable for; provide for the good of; work for the profit of, be of benefit to

tls:text.tls:srcline: 舉天下之顯榮者必稱此二士也。
tls:text.tls:line: but when one mentions distinguished and glorious individuals in all under Heaven, one always mentions these two gentlemen (Confucius and Mòzǐ).

sense.def: bring up, mention

tls:text.tls:srcline: 舉天下之顯榮者必稱此二士也。
tls:text.tls:line: but when one mentions distinguished and glorious individuals in all under Heaven, one always mentions these two gentlemen (Confucius and Mòzǐ).

sense.def: be intensely famous in any way or in every way

tls:text.tls:srcline: 舉天下之顯榮者必稱此二士也。
tls:text.tls:line: but when one mentions distinguished and glorious individuals in all under Heaven, one always mentions these two gentlemen (Confucius and Mòzǐ).

sense.def: speak of; mention

tls:text.tls:srcline: 舉天下之顯榮者必稱此二士也。
tls:text.tls:line: but when one mentions distinguished and glorious individuals in all under Heaven, one always mentions these two gentlemen (Confucius and Mòzǐ).

sense.def: 此三大夫

tls:text.tls:line: They have both died a long time ago,

sense.def: a long time ago

tls:text.tls:line: but their adherents of all kinds become more and more

sense.def: even more than before; the more... the more; ever more

sense.def: the disciples

sense.def: be in abundance, be many; be proliferating

tls:text.tls:line: so they completely fill out all under Heaven.

sense.def: fill out completely

sense.def: cause to be illustrious; promote reputation of

sense.def: period of time; era; age; times 文公之時

sense.def: be in short supply to the point of being used up

tls:text.tls:srcline: 子貢、子夏、曾子學於孔子，

tls:text.tls:srcline: 孔、墨之後學顯榮於天下者眾矣，
tls:text.tls:line: Later students of Confucius and of Mòzǐ who became famous in every way throughout all under Heaven are many,

tls:text.tls:line: Later students of Confucius and of Mòzǐ who became famous in every way throughout all under Heaven are many,

sense.def: be intensely famous in any way or in every way

sense.def: be counted

tls:text.tls:line: If one follows the right way

sense.def: the right kind of, the appropriate, the relevant, the suitable 其人

sense.def: achievements and fame; (justified) reputation

tls:text.tls:line: then success and fame are inevitable

sense.def: have a chance to; be able to, manage to

sense.def: be avoided

tls:text.tls:line: like the association of the time-pole with the shadow it casts,

sense.def: Duke of Zhōu (reigned 1042 - 1036)ALTERNATIVE NAMES: Wén 文, Dàn 旦 PARENTS: The fourth son of >Zhōu Wén wáng 周文王and his wife Tài Sì 太姒 WIVES: ?CHILDREN: Father of >Bó Qín 伯禽, Jún Chén 君陳, and six other sons.6. NOTE that the following chronology is uncertain. 1045 took part in the campaign against the Shāng 商. 1043 he is said to pray for the health of the > Wǔ wáng 武王. Described in the SHANGSHU, chapter Jīn téng. 1042 - 1036 ruled the empire instead of the young king Cheng, and defeated a revolt of Guǎn shu1 管叔, Cǎi shū 蔡叔, and Wǔ gēng 武庚 against the Zhou rule. 1036 founded the eastern capital at Lu4o yì洛邑. 1022 died (according to ZZJN in 21st year of > Zhōu Chéng wáng 周成王 ) 7. -8. A. Highly estimated already by Confucius. 久矣吾不復夢見周公！ How much time has passed where I have not seen the Duke of Zhōu<> any more<> in a dream<>!" （ LY 7.5) B. In Han shu gu jin ren biao he is listed among 15 sheng ren 聖人 (Sages).

tls:text.tls:line: He then composed the song entitled, "Grinding an Ax".

sense.def: song; popular song (also that of primitive peoples etc) 人聲曰歌. 歌柯也. 所歌之言是其質也. 以聲吟詠有上下如草木之有柯葉也. 故兗冀言 歌聲如柯也 Songs of humans are called gē. gē “song” is kē “branch.” The words sung, these are the substance. When using the voice one chants, the voice goes up and down, like plants and trees having stems and leaves. Thus in the Yuan and in the Jì areas they pronounce ky “sing” with a sound like kē “branch”.
